scripts.install:all: npm i && npm i --prefix ./azure-functions/acbs-function && npm i --prefix ./azure-functions/number-generator-function && npm i --prefix ./dtfs-central-api && npm i --prefix ./reference-data-proxy && npm i --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ./gef-ui && npm i --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ./portal && npm i --prefix ./portal-api && npm i --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ./trade-finance-manager-ui && npm i --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ./trade-finance-manager-api
scripts.update:all: npm update --save && npm update --save --prefix ./azure-functions/acbs-function && npm update --save --prefix ./azure-functions/number-generator-function && npm update --save --prefix ./dtfs-central-api && npm update --save --prefix ./reference-data-proxy && npm update --save --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ./gef-ui && npm update --save --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ./portal && npm update --save --prefix ./portal-api && npm update --save --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ./trade-finance-manager-ui && npm update --save --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ./trade-finance-manager-api
scripts.audit:all: npm audit && npm audit --prefix ./azure-functions/acbs-function && npm audit --prefix ./azure-functions/number-generator-function && npm audit --prefix ./dtfs-central-api && npm audit --prefix ./reference-data-proxy && npm audit --prefix ./gef-ui && npm audit --prefix ./portal && npm audit --prefix ./portal-api && npm audit --prefix ./trade-finance-manager-ui && npm audit --prefix ./trade-finance-manager-api
